name: Corona Go (Hesi.gdev)
description: CORONA GO WASD -- Movement [SPACE] / K  --  Attack (Throw vaccine syringe) Take sanitizers to gain protective shield. Take Down Corona virus with vaccine syringes. Hitting Corona viruses will get you back the syringe. Get +10 bonus on destroying the Corona. This is a casual game just for fun. This is my first game which I made and published. Leave comment for further improvements. Hope you like it.
